title: Chez Jules
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Beer/Wine, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Most food is locally sourced and organic and everything but the crackers and bread are in-house-made from scratch. Free Wi-Fi. As of May 2014, offers one daily changing vegan starter, one daily changing vegan main course and one vegan dessert, as well as one starter and main that can be made vegan. All mains are served with a pan of fresh vegetables. Side note: The mayor is vegan.
